Update frequency.description: How many hours should be between each request to the World Meteorological Organization server. A lower number means more frequent updates. Default is 1 hour.

Metric.description: Should values be shown in metric (Celcius) or imperial (Fahrenheit) units? Default is metric.

Debugging.description: Advanced. Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log.
